system.description:
When you wildly strike out with intent to kill them, roll +Blood.

On a 7+, you may take damage to deal damage to them.

On a 10+, you deal damage to them, in addition to the 7+ result.

On a 6-, you may take 2 damage to deal damage anyway.

failure.value: You may take 2 damage to deal damage anyway.

partial.value: You may take damage to deal damage to them.

success.value: You deal damage to them, in addition to the 7+ result.
